title: Create BboxImage in Matplotlib
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create a BboxImage in Matplotlib. A BboxImage can be used to position an image according to a bounding box. We will show how to create a BboxImage with Text and how to create a BboxImage for each colormap.

meta.title: Create BboxImage in Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create a BboxImage in Matplotlib, a tool for positioning images according to a bounding box.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, BboxImage, image positioning, data visualization, programming tutorial
